comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/text?doc=Perseus%3Atext%3A20... indicates that there was a James W Wray in Company E. So this might be a possibility other than the one in the record.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research swanq. In the American Civil War Database, I find a James H. Ray, who enlisted into K Company in the 11th Virginia. However, your James W. Wray in E Company of the same regiment  shows a Lynchburg address.  I'm not sure which way to go with this one.
